title: Integrated Mathematics Reasoning and Mathematical Register Instruction for Multilingual Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and academic experience at or above secondary education level
context.additional_context: A learning environment where learners primarily use smartphones as their main tool, focusing on acquiring mathematical registers (symbols, terminology, representational systems) through social constructivist-based discussion activities and problem-solving heuristics

learning_goals: Learners can utilize appropriate mathematical registers (symbols, graphs, formulas) with over 80% accuracy when modeling real-life problems mathematically
Through collaborative discussions with peers (online forums, group activities), learners can present at least three problem-solving strategies when resolving complex math problems
Learners can explain mathematical reasoning processes through verbal and visual representations (text, sketches) and achieve peer or instructor feedback of at least 3 out of 4 points

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
